reviewText:
WAY low budget movie, but very funny for adults =)
I bought for my daughter's Sweet 16 as a gag. Her nick name was " Ava" growing up & we're HUGE Patrick Dempsey fans!!! Thought it would have him in a more prominent role, but was Still cute ;-) My  daughter thought it was funny, in a "B movie" sorda way. Recommend it IF u don't intended to allow children to see it, it's labeled as "children & family" so we got an education.
